Package com.ltsllc.miranda.cluster

Class ClusterHandler

java.lang.Object
com.ltsllc.miranda.cluster.ClusterHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.mina.core.service.IoHandler
public class ClusterHandler extends Object implements org.apache.mina.core.service.IoHandler
A connection to another node in the cluster

This class implements the Cluster protocol (see the package documentation).

    • ourRandom

      protected static com.ltsllc.commons.util.ImprovedRandom ourRandom

    • state

      protected ClusterConnectionStates state
      The connection state. The connection starts in the start state.

    • cache

      protected LoggingCache cache
      A message cache

      Other nodes could ask for a message we have.

    • stateStack

      protected Stack<ClusterConnectionStates> stateStack
      A stack that contains the state to goto once we are done looking up a message

      If we are currently not looking up a message, then this stack should be empty.

    • uuid

      protected UUID uuid
      The uuid of this node

    • partnerID

      protected UUID partnerID
      The uuid of the node we are connected to, or null if we don't know

    • node

      protected Node node
      The node that represents the other part of this connection

    • exceptionCaught

      public void exceptionCaught(org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession, Throwable throwable)
      An exception occurred in this ClusterHandler The response to this happening is to send an error to the other node and to return to the start state.
      Specified by:
      exceptionCaught in interface org.apache.mina.core.service.IoHandler
      Parameters:
      ioSession - The session where this occurred
      throwable - The exception

    • messageReceived

      public void messageReceived(org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession, Object o) throws IOException, com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      The node received a message

      This method is really the "heart" of this class, and a thorough understanding of this method is required to understand this class.

      The general state is where a connection usually exists while it is awaiting the next message.

      Specified by:
      messageReceived in interface org.apache.mina.core.service.IoHandler
      Parameters:
      ioSession - The sender node
      o - The message
      Throws:
      IOException
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException

    • messageSent

      public void messageSent(org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession session, Object message)
      Specified by:
      messageSent in interface org.apache.mina.core.service.IoHandler

    • inputClosed

      public void inputClosed(org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession)
      An IoSession closed - remove it from the cluster
      Specified by:
      inputClosed in interface org.apache.mina.core.service.IoHandler
      Parameters:

    • determineMessageType

      protected MessageType determineMessageType(String s)
      Convert a string to a MessageType NOTE: the method uses the various constants like AUCTION to identify the input.
      Parameters:
      s - The string to convert. This is assumed to be in upper case.
      Returns:
      The MessageType that the string represents or MessageType.UNKNOWN if the method doesn't recognize it.

    • pushState

      protected void pushState(ClusterConnectionStates state)
      "push" a state onto the state stack This method does not set the state.
      Parameters:
      state - The state that the caller wants to push.

    • popState

      protected ClusterConnectionStates popState() throws com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Pop a state off the state stack.

      NOTE: this method assumes that the stateStack is not empty.

      This method does not set the state.

      Returns:
      A state
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException - This method throws this exception if the stateStack is empty.

    • sendMessage

      protected void sendMessage(UUID uuid, org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession) throws IOException, com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Send a Message over an IoSession

      This method sends a com.ltsllc.miranda.message.Message over an IoSession.

      Parameters:
      uuid - The Message to send. NOTE: the uuid must exist in the message cache.
      ioSession - The IoSession over which to send it.
      Throws:
      IOException
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException

    • readMessage

      protected Message readMessage(String inputMessage)
      Convert a message message into a Message
      Parameters:
      inputMessage - The string to convert
      Returns:
      The message

    • sendMessage

      protected void sendMessage(Message message, org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession)
      Send a message message over an IoSession
      Parameters:
      message - The message to send.
      ioSession - The IoSession to send it on.

    • handleBid

      protected void handleBid(String input, org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession, UUID partnerID) throws IOException
      Handle a bid This method takes care of a bid. It reads in the message UUID and bid and sends out a bid of it's own.
      Parameters:
      input - A string containing a bid message.
      ioSession - The IoSession to respond to.
      partnerID - The uuid of the other node for this ioSession
      Throws:
      IOException

    • handleNewNode

      protected void handleNewNode(String input, org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession) throws IOException, com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Read and handle a new node message This method takes care of the new node's UUID and "filling it in" on the messages that this node knows about.
      Parameters:
      input - A string containing the message.
      ioSession - The session for the new node.
      Throws:
      IOException
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException

    • handleNewMessage

      protected void handleNewMessage(String input, UUID partnerUuid) throws com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException, IOException
      Process the new message message This method reads in the new message message and updates the cache NOTE: java.util.Scanner has a bug where skip(<pattern>) will not find a pattern after first calling skip(<pattern>) but next() will. For that reason, the method uses next() instead of skip(<pattern>).
      Parameters:
      input - A string containing the message.
      partnerUuid - The UUID of our partner
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException - If there is a problem adding the message.
      IOException

    • handleGetMessage

      protected void handleGetMessage(String input, org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession) throws IOException, com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Handle a get message message This method takes care of reading in the message ID and sending back the requested message.
      Parameters:
      input - A string containing the new message message. Note that this method assumes that this string has been capitalized.
      ioSession - The session over which to respond.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is a problem looking up the message in the cache.
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException

    • undefineMessage

      public void undefineMessage(Message message, UUID owner)
      Tell the cache to discard the message, and set the owner of a message to the specified owner
      Parameters:
      message - The message.
      owner - The owner.

    • handleStart

      protected void handleStart(String input, org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession)
      Handle a start message. This method sets the partnerID and the state by side effect. The response to this is to send a start of our own, with our UUID and to go into the general state.
      Parameters:
      input - The string that came to us.
      ioSession - The IoSession associated with this connection.

    • handleMessageDelivered

      public void handleMessageDelivered(String input) throws com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException, IOException
      Handle a message delivered message
      Parameters:
      input - The string we received.
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException - If the cache has problems removing the message
      IOException

    • handleGetMessageAuction

      public void handleGetMessageAuction(String input, org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession) throws IOException, com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException
      Handle a get message message while in the auction state
      Parameters:
      input - The message we received.
      ioSession - The IoSession over which we received it
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is a problem sending the message
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException

    • handleMessage

      public void handleMessage(String input, org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession) throws com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException, IOException
      Handle a message message
      Parameters:
      input - The message we received;
      ioSession - The ioSession over which we received the message.
      Throws:
      com.ltsllc.commons.LtsllcException - If there is a problem looking up the message.
      IOException

    • handleError

      public void handleError(String s, org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession ioSession)
      Handle an error by sending a start message

      This method first sends an error, and then a start message.

      Parameters:
      s - The error message (unused).
      ioSession - The session we should send the start over.
